/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApOngdRefVwDDao.selectApOngdRefVwD */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.REGR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) REGR_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'REF_VW_STAT_CD' AND CD = M.REF_VW_STAT_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) REF_VW_STAT_NM,
FROM ( SELECT * FROM (
SELECT
TOP (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ${orderBy}N.APV_NO DESC, N.REF_VWR_UID DESC) AS RNUM, N.* FROM (SELECT
T.APV_NO, T.REF_VWR_UID, T.REGR_UID, T.SORT_ORDR, T.REF_VW_STAT_CD, T.REF_VWR_NM, T.REF_VWR_POSIT_CD, T.REF_VWR_POSIT_NM, T.REF_VWR_TITLE_CD, T.REF_VWR_TITLE_NM, T.REF_VWR_DEPT_ID, T.REF_VWR_DEPT_NM, CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), T.REF_VW_DT, 120) REF_VW_DT, T.REF_VW_OPIN_CONT, CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), T.REG_DT, 120) REG_DT, CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), T.VW_DT, 120) VW_DT, T.REF_VW_FIXD_APVR_YN,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.REGR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) REGR_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'REF_VW_STAT_CD' AND CD = T.REF_VW_STAT_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) REF_VW_STAT_NM,
FROM AP_${storage}_REF_VW_${tableType} T
AND T.APV_NO = #{apvNo, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND T.REF_VWR_UID = #{refVwrUid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.REGR_UID = #{regrUid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.APV_NO, T.REF_VWR_UID
) N ) M WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND RNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
